data.title: Michael Bell facts for kids
data.meta_description: Learn Michael Bell facts for kids
data.text:
Michael Bell (born July 30, 1938) is an American actor, director and animal-rights activist. He is known for his youthful voice. He has acted in video games and animated series, including The Transformers, G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero, The Houndcats, Rugrats, The Smurfs, and Snorks.

In live-action, he appeared in Dallas and Star Trek.
